<table border="0" width="100%"> <tbody> <tr> <td align="center" valign="top"> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="San Carlos Cathedral, from front plaza" title="San Carlos Cathedral, from front plaza" hspace="10" src="snapshots/SanCarlosCathedralFrontPlazaMarch2012.png" width="116" height="100" align="middle"/></a> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="San Carlos Cathedral, from rear balcony" title="San Carlos Cathedral, from rear balcony" hspace="10" src="snapshots/SanCarlosCathedralWithLightingFromBalcony.png" width="200" height="100" align="middle"/></a> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="San Carlos Cathedral, from above" title="San Carlos Cathedral, from above" hspace="10" src="snapshots/SanCarlosCathedralFrontAbove.2012February.png" width="182" height="100" align="middle"/></a> </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="left"> <p> We are building a large, detailed archival model of the <a href="http://www.sancarloscathedral.org">San Carlos Cathedral</a> in Monterey California in order to show low-cost modeling and photographic methods for documenting <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultural_heritage">cultural heritage</a> and supporting <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Historic_preservation">historic preservation</a>. This work includes a <a href="documentation/ModelingSanCarlosCathedralCulturalHeritageCaseStudyUsingX3D.2015April1.pdf">case study paper</a>, <a href="RoyalPresidioChapelHistoricalReferences.pdf">historical reference materials</a> and a <a href="TODO.html">TODO</a> list. </p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
